keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: A ballot measure has put conservative critics in the unusual position of defending the Affordable Care Act against an assault from the left.

headline.print_headline: Colorado Voters to Weigh Universal Health Coverage
headline.main: Colorado Weighs Replacing Obama’s Health Policy With Universal Coverage

snippet: A ballot measure has put conservative critics in the unusual position of defending the Affordable Care Act against an assault from the left.
abstract: Colorado voters will have opportunity to vote in November on whether to adopt new, taxpayer-financed universal health coverage system for residents in state; plan would replace system created under Affordable Care Act, and vote has put conservatives in odd position of having to defend law in order to oppose universal coverage.
